# 8.0 Docs

> Documentation for 8.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 9*

- [Breaking change: Rate-limiting middleware requires AddRateLimiter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/addratelimiter-requirement.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where rate-limiting middleware now requires AddRateLimiter to be called on app startup.
- [Breaking change: IFormFile parameters require anti-forgery checks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/antiforgery-checks.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where minimal APIs that consume IFormFile or IFormFileCollection parameters require anti-forgery checks.
- [Breaking change: ConcurrencyLimiterMiddleware is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/concurrencylimitermiddleware-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where ConcurrencyLimiterMiddleware has been obsoleted.
- [Breaking change: Forwarded Headers Middleware ignores X-Forwarded-* headers from unknown proxies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/forwarded-headers-unknown-proxies.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core where Forwarded Headers Middleware now ignores headers from proxies that aren't explicitly configured as trusted.
- [Breaking change: HTTP logging middleware requires AddHttpLogging()](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/httplogging-addhttplogging-requirement.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where HTTP logging middleware now requires AddHttpLogging() to be called.
- [Breaking change: ISystemClock is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/isystemclock-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where ISystemClock and constructors that use it have been marked obsolete.
- [Breaking change: Custom converters for serialization removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/problemdetails-custom-converters.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where 'ValidationProblemDetails' and 'ProblemDetails' no longer use custom converters.
- [Breaking change: Security token events return a JsonWebToken](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/securitytoken-events.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where the JwtBearer, WsFederation, and OpenIdConnect events context properties of type 'SecurityToken' now return a 'JsonWebToken' by default.
- [Breaking change: TrimMode defaults to full for Web SDK projects](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/8.0/trimmode-full.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where 'TrimMode' defaults to 'full' for Web SDK projects.
